name: European Carbon Materials and Technology Congress
content: European Carbon Materials and Technology Congress (ECMT20) creates global networking to facilitate multi-disciplinary cooperation for research, innovations, and technology that results in translational developments. Call for Abstracts European Carbon Materials and Technology Congress invites researchers, scientific communities, students and business professionals from all over the world to attend the three-day international conference to be held in Stockholm, Sweden during 09 - 11 June, 2020\. The 34th Assembly of AMC will offer coordination of following contemporary research fields to pave the way for multi-inter-trans-disciplinary translational research and innovations for the market. 1\. Carbon Materials and Technology 2\. Water Technology 3\. Epoxy and Resins technology 4\. Plastics and Rubber Technology 5\. Pulp and Paper Technology 6\. Wood Technology
